title: big bug on akali
body: i noticed that after i made an akali go 0-10 that her ult did crazy amounts of dmg and  i was stacking MR... is this a bug? if not then skill shots dmg should be increased or akali ult needs a nerf

replies.body:
Nice try, but no. Looking at your match history the akali had 6 deaths so no you didn't make her go 0/10. And you weren't stacking MR, you had just SV and merc treads. The same thing goes for any assassins, they can easily snowball with just a few kills even if they were behind. 
And what skill shots damage should be increased? Akali has no skill shots. Is that why you think champs with skill shot needs to be buffed?
first off its on another account.... you can outplay any other assassin but akali. zed... u can dodge or qss his ult...

Sure...of course it's another account. Why wouldn't it be? 
Every assassin has their counters, you can of course outplay any assassins depending on the champ you're playing.
